name: Rinni Wulandari
description: '''Rini Wulandari''' (born 29 April 1990) or known by her stage name, '''RINNI,''' is an Indonesian R&B singer. On 28 July 2007, she won the fourth season of the reality television show ''[[Indonesian Idol]]'', making her the second female winner. She won the competition at the age of 17, making her the first youngest winner in ''[[Indonesian Idol]]'' history.
